trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Holland
There were no other sightings in Holland on or around January 18th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsfor the past week there have been fireball UFO"S flying at incredable speeds over lake mi. also being persued by jet aircraft. making w like patters and bouncing up and down like pingpong balls. stealth aircraft have been seen many of these nights "in chase"of the fireballs. also a strange bight multicolor light object has been hanging over the lake without moving what so ever. lights are in the west and southwest of the sky moving very fast and extremely irratic. following no flight path or keeping a straight line. have aslo been going from dead stop to light speed and them stoping dead again. very stange but becoming too often of a sight in the sky. i allmost expect them to be there since they have every night for the past wek. what is this????? too fast to be a plane and making manuvers that would kill a person from the inside out. WHATEVER THESE ARE THEY ARE PULLING SOME SERIOUS G'S......
